edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart

Class PPChart

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart.PPChart
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PPLineChart, PPPieChart

    public abstract class PPChart
extends Object
    This class is the top of the abstract hierarchy for charts created using the pptx.chart package. Each of the chart subclasses export methods for assembling charts on a slide. In most cases, these methods are exported in two forms: (1) an addxxx method that adds an element to a slide and (2) a createxxx method that creates the element so that the client can add it later. Both methods return the created shape so that the client can add animations or change its properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPChart(PPSlide slide, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new chart object on the slide with the specified bounds.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPChart

        public PPChart(PPSlide slide,
               double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height)
        Creates a new chart object on the slide with the specified bounds.
        Parameters:
        slide - The PPSlide object on which this chart appears
        x - The left side of the bounding box
        y - The top side of the bounding box
        width - The width of the bounding box
        height - The height of the bounding box

    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        public Rectangle2D getBounds()
        Gets the bounds of the chart on the slide.
        Returns:
        The bounds of the chart on the slide

      • setChartLimits

        public void setChartLimits(double xmin,
                           double xmax,
                           double ymin,
                           double ymax)
        Sets the limits of the chart area in units appropriate to the application. Note that the coordinate system inside the chart is Cartesian, with the origin in the lower left corner.
        Parameters:
        xmin - The minimum x value at the left
        xmax - The maximum x value at the right
        ymin - The minimum y value at the bottom
        ymax - The maximum y value at the top

      • setChartBounds

        public void setChartBounds(double x,
                           double y,
                           double width,
                           double height)
        Sets the limits of the chart area in units using parameters defining a bounding box in the chart space.
        Parameters:
        x - The minimum x value at the left
        y - The minimum y value at the bottom
        width - The width in chart space
        height - The height in chart space

      • getChartBounds

        public Rectangle2D getChartBounds()
        Gets the limits of the chart area in units appropriate to the application. The result is returned as a Cartesian rectangle with the origin in the lower left corner.
        Returns:
        A Rectangle2D describing the bounds in chart space

      • addBackground

        public PPRect addBackground()
        Adds the shape corresponding to the background to the slide. With no parameter, addBackground creates a white background.
        Returns:
        The background shape

        public PPRect addBorder()

        The shape representing the border

      • addBottomLabel

        public PPTextBox addBottomLabel(double x,
                                String str)
        Adds a label to the tick mark at the bottom of the chart. The label is centered underneath the tick mark.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the tick mark
        str - The text for the label
        Returns:
        The label

                                   String str)

        str - The text for the label
        Returns:
        The label

      • addBottomLabel

        public PPTextBox addBottomLabel(double x,
                                String str,
                                double theta)
        Adds a label to the tick mark at the bottom of the chart. If theta is 0, the label is centered under the tick mark; otherwise the label is rotated by theta degrees so that the end of the label is correctly oriented at the center of the tick.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the tick mark
        str - The text for the label
        theta - The angle of rotation in degrees
        Returns:
        The label

      • createBottomLabel

        public PPTextBox createBottomLabel(double x,
                                   String str,
                                   double theta)
        Creates a label to the tick mark at the bottom of the chart. If theta is 0, the label is centered under the tick mark; otherwise the label is rotated by theta degrees so that the end of the label is correctly oriented at the center of the tick.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the tick mark
        str - The text for the label
        theta - The angle of rotation in degrees
        Returns:
        The label
